snippet: Technical experts and electric-car enthusiasts are debating whether it is possible for an electric car's battery pack to become irreversibly depleted, or to "brick," and under what circumstances.
abstract: Technical experts and electric-car enthusiasts are debating whether it is possible for an electric car's battery pack to become irreversibly depleted, or to "brick," and under what circumstances.

headline.main: Of Bricks and Batteries: The Anatomy of a Controversy
